utility_relocation_details.description: Details specific to an agreement for the relocation of utility infrastructure.

project_requiring_relocation.description: The name or description of the project necessitating the utility move.

facilities_to_be_relocated.description: A summary of the utility infrastructure being moved (e.g., 'underground electrical conduit', 'water mains').

cost_responsibility.description: A summary of who is responsible for the costs of the relocation.
